Title: RANK()
Description: RANK() 函数的作用类似于 DENSE_RANK()，但在处理具有相同值和排序条件的行时返回的排名是不连续的。这意味着它提供的是绝对排名。例如，排名 7 意味着有 6 个行的排名更靠前。

SELECT
    *,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n),
    DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n)
FROM (
    SELECT 5 AS 'n'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 8
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 5
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 30
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 31
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 32) a;
Examples:
SELECT
    *,
    RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n),
    DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY n)
FROM (
    SELECT 5 AS 'n'
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 8
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 5
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 30
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 31
    UNION ALL
    SELECT 32) a;
